text: Julia Frances Newbern-Langford (April 4, 1913 â€“ July 11, 2005) was an American singer and actress. She was popular during the Golden Age of Radio. She also appeared in movies such as in This Is the Army and in Yankee Doodle Dandy. Langford was born in Lakeland, Florida. Langford died in Jensen Beach, Florida from congestive heart failure, aged 92. title: Frances Langford
